instruction: What kinds of spectrum (VIS/NIRS) were used in the related study on the quantification of meat quality in pigs?

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were used to select the feature wavelengths of the measured traits in the related study on the quantification of meat quality in pigs?

instruction: How did the researchers evaluate the prediction performance of the different models used in the related study on the quantification of meat quality in pigs?

instruction: Can the visible and near-infrared spectroscopy (VIS/NIRS) method be considered superior to traditional methods for quantifying meat quality in pigs, based on the prediction performances of the different models used in the related study on the quantification of meat quality in pigs?
